specialEventConditions.title: Christmas/NYE Policy - 2025/2026
specialEventConditions.description:
During the Christmas and New Year Holiday there are minimum stay restrictions. Christmas Restrictions - 2 nights on the 24th + 25th. New Year Restrictions - 3 nights 30th, 31st, + 1st. Please call if you require more information.

Deluxe Pods are located in 4 and 6-bed mixed dorms, offering a more private option. Please request the 4-bed dorm if you have a preference. Individuals under the age of 18 are not accepted in the hostel during Christmas and New Year, and the age limit is 20+ unless accompanied by a parent. No refund applies if you do not inform in advance about the special request.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
